REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0646 reute u f BC-GUNZE-SANGYO-ISSUING 03-11 0058

TEXT.TITLE: GUNZE SANGYO ISSUING 25 MLN SWISS FRANC NOTES
TEXT.BODY: Gunze Sangyo Inc of Tokyo is issuing 25 mln Swiss francs of five year convertible notes with a 1-1/2 pct coupon, lead manager Swiss Volksbank said. The conversion price has been set at 463 yen per share, compared with today's 450 yen close. Payment is due March 30. REUTER
